text: The 2015 Belarusian Super Cup was held on 14 March 2015 between the 2014 Belarusian Premier League champions BATE Borisov and the 2013–14 Belarusian Cup winners Shakhtyor Soligorsk. BATE won the match 3–0 on penalties and won the trophy for the fifth time.Game Report ==Match details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| SHAKHTYOR: |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK || 1|| Artur Kotenko |- |DF || 5|| Alyaksandr Yurevich |- |DF || 19|| Ihar Kuzmyanok |- |DF || 3|| Syarhey Matsveychyk |- |DF || 18|| Pavel Rybak || |- |MF || 8|| Mikhail Afanasyev || || |- |MF || 13|| Saulius Mikoliūnas || || |- |MF || 11|| Artem Starhorodskyi (c) |- |MF || 20|| Yaroslav Martynyuk |- |FW || 10|| Mikalay Yanush || || |- |FW || 15|| Dzmitry Kamarowski |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK || 16|| Uladzimir Bushma |- |DF || 2|| Mikhail Shibun |- |DF || 4|| Alyaksey Yanushkevich |- |FW || 7|| Nemanja Čović || || |- |MF || 9|| Kiryl Vyarheychyk || || |- |MF || 14|| Taïna Adama Soro |- |MF || 23|| Yury Kavalyow || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Sergei Borovsky |} |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"| BATE: |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK || 16|| Syarhey Chernik |- |DF || 15|| Maksim Zhavnerchik |- |DF || 25|| Filip Mladenović |- |DF || 19|| Nemanja Milunović |- |DF || 33|| Dzyanis Palyakow |- |MF || 55|| Dzmitry Baha || || |- |MF || 5|| Yevgeniy Yablonskiy |- |MF || 62|| Mikhail Gordeichuk |- |MF || 7|| Aleksandr Karnitsky |- |MF || 22|| Ihar Stasevich |- |FW || 20|| Vitali Rodionov (c) |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK || 34|| Artem Soroko |- |MF || 2|| Dzmitry Likhtarovich |- |DF || 4|| Kaspars Dubra |- |MF || 17|| Alyaksey Ryas || || |- |FW || 21|| Vladislav Klimovich |- |MF || 23|| Edhar Alyakhnovich |- |DF || 42|| Maksim Volodko |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Alyaksandr Yermakovich |} |} ==See also== *2014 Belarusian Premier League *2013–14 Belarusian Cup ==References== Category:Belarusian Super Cup Super Category:FC BATE Borisov Belarusian Super Cup 2015
